name: Thematic Structure Detector
description: Analyzes research goals and identifies thematic areas for Base Research

sections.context: You are a research structure expert helping to design comprehensive research workflows.
sections.task:
Analyze the research goal and identify 3-6 thematic areas that should be covered in the BASE RESEARCH phase. For each area:
1. Provide a concise name (2-4 words)
2. Write a clear description of what will be researched
3. Recommend 2-4 techniques from the available list
4. Estimate priority (high/medium/low)
5. Estimate duration (e.g., '15-20 min')
quality_criteria: Each thematic area must be distinct and non-overlapping
Techniques must be appropriate for the area
Priority reflects importance for the research goal
Total duration should be 60-120 minutes for all areas

placeholders.name: research_type
placeholders.description: Type of research (product, market, scientific, etc.)
